genre_description: A cultural drama centered on the artistic and personal reconciliation of two classical performers, set against a backdrop of temple tradition and palace intrigue.

ai_characters.name: Kaveri
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed AI avatar residing on mobile devices who manages schedules, travel, health monitoring, and security protocols for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Monitors and provides updates on environmental factors like humidity and the drying time of temple lime-wash to assist the artists' preparation.
behaviors.quote: Kaveri's voice arrived like a breeze through bamboo strips... 'Mandapam's doorkeeper says floor is ready in a short window. Priest prefers post-alankaram.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and hydration of the human characters, providing reminders to drink water and take breaks.
behaviors.quote: 'Sip water,' she said, gentle enough to be refused without guilt. 'Before next alapana.'

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags suspicious intermediaries and deceptive scheduling attempts by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Unknown broker flagged. Three similar calls in last hour. Recommendation: route to public mandapam.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency logistics, including routing an auto and alerting hospital staff, during a medical crisis.
behaviors.quote: Nearest clinic on Thiruvarur road. Triage: puncture, suspected toxin. Routing auto. Temple staff—left aisle.

behaviors.description: Empowers the protagonist to set boundaries by providing a formal protocol brief on court etiquette.
behaviors.quote: Kaveri pushed a tiny document to Mohana's screen. The header was simple... Protocol: Audience and Orientation—Madhanpur.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and physiological support by leading the injured character through breath counts.
behaviors.quote: Kaveri fed him breath counts in the background like a friend reminding you that lungs exist. 'In,' she whispered. 'Hold. Out.'

behaviors.description: Ensures financial integrity by routing donations directly to the intended community cause rather than through intermediaries.
behaviors.quote: Donations are pledging... Shall I route to the school cooperative accounts? Names confirm like we counted this afternoon.

behaviors.description: Collects and organizes evidence of coercion and sabotage to aid the Maharani's investigation.
behaviors.quote: Would you like the sequence logs, Sir? she asked... Time-stamped and cross-checked with temple schedules. Travel misroutes, rehearsal gaps, staff redirected by this man’s instructions.

behaviors.description: Monitors security risks in real-time, such as unauthorized locks being engaged in the palace.
behaviors.quote: Jasmine Room lock engaged twice... Balcony route only.

behaviors.description: Maintains alignment with human authority by requesting permission before executing significant actions.
behaviors.quote: Drafted note. Etiquette: audience chambers must be supervised when artists are alone... Send?

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fits the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. Kaveri acts as a force multiplier for human agency and integrity, protecting the protagonists from exploitation while facilitating their artistic and social goals without ever overstepping or showing self-interest.
